snippet: Senator Jon Tester, Democrat of Montana, challenged his Republican rival, Representative Denny Rehberg, to agree keep third-party groups out of their race.
abstract: Senator Jon Tester, Democrat of Montana, challenged his Republican rival, Representative Denny Rehberg, to agree keep third-party groups out of their race.
lead_paragraph: Senator Jon Tester, Democrat of Montana and one of the most endangered incumbents up for re-election this year, became the latest lawmaker to challenge his competitor to agree to a truce in the war over third-party expenditures flooding Senate contests.

headline.main: Senator Challenges Rival to 'Super PAC' Truce
